meanings.sent1: The fragrance of flowers filled the room.
meanings.sent2: I love the fragrance of freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent3: The fragrance of the perfume was so strong, it tickled my nose.
meanings.sent4: The fragrance of success lingered in the air after her big promotion.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of pine trees in the forest was intoxicating.

meanings.definition: A substance that emits a pleasant odor
meanings.sent1: She sprayed the fragrance on her wrists before going out.
meanings.sent2: The fragrance from the scented candle filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The fragrance of the air freshener made the room smell like a meadow.
meanings.sent4: The fragrance of the essential oils wafted through the spa.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the perfume was so alluring.

meanings.definition: The quality of having a pleasant smell
meanings.sent1: The fragrance of the roses in the garden was delightful.
meanings.sent2: The fragrance of the freshly cut grass was invigorating.
meanings.sent3: The fragrance of the bakery made my stomach growl.
meanings.sent4: The fragrance of the coffee shop drew me in from the street.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the ocean breeze was refreshing.
